getting_married_neil: Hi {{name}}! I'm getting married to Kat and I look forward to sharing this special moment with you.
getting_married_kat: Hi {{name}}! I'm getting married to Neil and I look forward to sharing this special moment with you.
hotel_info: Please book your stay at the Brussels Marriott Hotel Grand Place using our party reservation link below.
airport_info: The closest airport is Brussels International Airport (BRU). From there, we recommend taking a taxi to the hotel.
advisory: Please ensure that your passport does not expire before March 2022. If you are not a US or EU citizen, you likely need a visa to travel. We will update this page as soon as Belgium opens visa applications, we expect it to be soon.
venue_info: On Sunday, the wedding will take place at Chateau Bayard. Transportation will be provided from the hotel.
bus_to_bayard_desc: Busses to the wedding venue will depart from the hotel.
bus_to_hotel_desc: There will be multiple rounds of shuttles starting at 9:30pm.
sangeet_desc: The highlight of Indian weddings with dancing and speeches.
pub_desc: Tour Delirium Village with us to kick off the weekend!
baraat_desc: A traditional Indian parade as the groom is welcomed by the bride's family.
lunch_desc: We'll start the day off with a light lunch by the water.
saturday_desc: We will spend the day touring Bruges together.
lunch_desc: We'll start the day off with a light lunch by the water.
welcome_lunch_desc: Join us for a casual welcome lunch at the hotel before the festivities begin.
reception_desc: Explore the castle, and enjoy drinks and finger foods.
dinner_desc: Seated dinner will be served in the orangerie.
schedule_note: All times are in local Brussels time (CEST). Breakfast will be available at the hotel every morning.
submitting: Carefully framing your response on our wall...
what_happened: Please let us know what happened.
party_got_better: The party just got even better!
cant_wait_to_see_you: We can't wait to see you!
share_with_you: We're excited to share this moment with you!
which_events: Which events will you be attending?
who_attending: Please share the names of everyone in your party for dinner seating.
what_else_false: We're sad to hear that! Anything we should know?
comments: For example: dietary restrictions, allergies, song requests, etc
comments_false: Hope you have a good excuse...
